selectedVerses.text: No wisdom, no understanding, no counsel can avail against the LORD.
And as for the two kings, their hearts shall be bent on doing evil. They shall speak lies at the same table, but to no avail, for the end is yet to be at the time appointed.
Will your cry for help avail to keep you from distress, or all the force of your strength?
Were you a slave when called? Do not be concerned about it. But if you can gain your freedom, avail yourself of the opportunity.
I was mute and silent; I held my peace to no avail, and my distress grew worse.
